basic.description:
The political, social, cultural and economic development of the Maritimes and Newfoundland from the early 17th century to the present.
LEARNING HOURS    180 (36S;144P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Atlantic Canada

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
